replies.author: SkyCatcher
replies.txt_content:
groups:
  Builder:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    - essentials.help
    - essentials.login
    - essentials.register
    - essentials.rules
    - essentials.spawn
    - essentials.delhome
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.pay
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.suicide
    - essentials.msg
    - essentials.tpa
    - essentials.tpaccept
    - essentials.tpahere
    - essentials.tpdeny
    inheritance: []
    info:
      prefix: '[&7平民&f]'
      build: true
      suffix: ''复制代码飞行权限是    - essentials.fly

replies.author: Bruce.Owen
replies.txt_content: ESS插件的权限完全是看服住给了什么的

replies.author: ouyang
replies.txt_content:
Bruce.Owen 发表于 2013-8-25 14:43 
ESS插件的权限完全是看服住给了什么的
我是腐竹啊

replies.author: Bruce.Owen
replies.txt_content:
ouyang 发表于 2013-8-25 14:50 
我是腐竹啊
plugins的GroupManager文件夹下有一个groups.yml，打开，里面有builder的可用权限，一般默认的是可以开创造模式

replies.author: ouyang
replies.txt_content:
Bruce.Owen 发表于 2013-8-25 14:54 
plugins的GroupManager文件夹下有一个groups.yml，打开，里面有builder的可用权限，一般默认的是可以开创 ...

replies.txt_content:
